isUseCitexploreWs

boolean isUseCitexploreWs()

setUseCitexploreWs

void setUseCitexploreWs(boolean useCitexploreWs)
Whether to use CiteXplore to get the list of citations for a given enzyme, or only to retrieve the nitty-gritty details of them.
Set this to false in case of trouble with CiteXplore web service. The details will be then retrieved from other sources after the timeouts have expired.

Parameters:
useCitexploreWs - true to retrieve the list of citations from CiteXplore (one single request), false to retrieve it from the different resources (one request per tab - enzyme|structure|molecules|diseases - plus one request more per citation).
Since:
1.0.7

getMaxCitations

int getMaxCitations()

setMaxCitations

void setMaxCitations(int maxCitations)
Sets the maximum number of citations to be retrieved and displayed.

Parameters:
maxCitations - the maximum number of citations.
